/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Trees line the street, their green leaves adding a touch of nature to the concrete surroundings. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars parked along the side of the road hint at the city's active lifestyle. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and cars.
